nodes.display_name: You Are Ghost | Eres un Fantasma
nodes.long_description:
🎄 ¡La Aventura Navideña de los Fantasmas ha comenzado!

**¡You Are Ghost acaba de salir del Acceso Anticipado! 🔥** 

Descubre el nuevo HUB para mejorar poderes, desbloquear habilidades y personalizar a tu fantasma 💀✨. 

Además, juega el nuevo Modo Atraco, donde tu misión es robarle cosas al abuelo sin que te atrape. ¡El susto alcanza otro nivel!

{670033079290228}

**👻 Juega como un fantasma – ¡Asusta al abuelo con tu voz!**

You Are Ghost es una aventura sandbox donde te conviertes en un espíritu travieso en una casa embrujada llena de secretos, acertijos y sustos divertidísimos.

{1799272467306837}

Usa tus poderes para atravesar paredes, flotar, mover objetos y aterrorizar al abuelo con tu voz. Susurra, ríe o grita al micrófono y mira cómo entra en pánico.

¿Serás un bromista juguetón o una auténtica pesadilla? ¡La casa entera es tu patio de juegos!

{704625392015033}

🏚 Explora una mansión embrujada gigante con habitaciones ocultas, objetos misteriosos y sorpresas espeluznantes.

🎯 Cumple misiones, resuelve acertijos y engaña a NPCs para descubrir secretos paranormales.
⚡ Jugabilidad interactiva – abre puertas, tira muebles, haz parpadear luces y causa un caos total.

{695271392958248}

😂 ¿Broma o susto? Tú decides: sé un bromista divertido o una leyenda del terror.
🔥 Haz travesuras, diviértete y descubre todo lo que puedes hacer como fantasma.

{744848074531458}
nodes.short_description:
👻 ¡Juega como un fantasma y asusta al abuelo con tu voz!

You Are Ghost es una aventura tipo sandbox donde te conviertes en un espíritu travieso dentro de una casa encantada llena de secretos, desafíos y sustos divertidísimos. Usa tus poderes fantasmales para moverte sin ser visto, resolver acertijos espeluznantes ¡y usar tu propia voz para aterrorizar al abuelo!

¿Serás un bromista juguetón o la peor pesadilla? 

¡La casa es tu patio de juegos!

nodes.display_name: You Are Ghost | Tu es un Fantôme
nodes.short_description:
👻 Incarne un fantôme – Effraie Papi avec ta voix !

You Are Ghost est une aventure sandbox où tu deviens un esprit malicieux dans une maison hantée pleine de secrets, de défis et de frayeurs hilarantes. Utilise tes pouvoirs de fantôme pour te déplacer en toute discrétion, résoudre des énigmes effrayantes et utiliser ta propre voix pour terrifier le grand-père !

Sera-tu un farceur espiègle ou un vrai cauchemar ? 

La maison est ton terrain de jeu !

nodes.display_name: You Are Ghost | Du bist ein Geist
nodes.short_description:
👻 Spiele als Geist – erschrecke Opa mit deiner Stimme!

You Are Ghost ist ein Sandbox-Abenteuer, in dem du ein frecher Geist in einem Spukhaus voller Geheimnisse, Herausforderungen und urkomischer Schreckmomente wirst. Nutze deine Geisterkräfte, schleiche unsichtbar durchs Haus, löse gruselige Rätsel und erschrecke den alten Opa mit deiner eigenen Stimme!

Bist du ein verspielter Streichgeist oder der ultimative Albtraum? 

Das Haus ist dein Spielplatz!

nodes.long_description:
🎄 The Christmas Haunting has begun!

👻 Play as a Ghost – **Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!**

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. 

{3560432210926769}

Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

{1082626780574530}

👻 Become the Ultimate Ghost – Walk through walls, float, and move objects just by thinking about it!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice – Whisper, laugh, or scream into your mic and watch him panic!

{4004984733152897}

🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground – No rules, no limits! Roam freely through a giant haunted house, uncovering hidden rooms, mysterious objects, and eerie surprises.

🎯 Complete Fun Missions & Solve Puzzles – Trick NPCs, uncover paranormal secrets, and test your ghostly skills through spooky challenges!

⚡ Super Interactive Gameplay – Open doors, knock over furniture, flicker lights—cause total chaos and see how NPCs react!

{1314190086311177}

😂 Prank or Scare? It’s Up to You! – Be a sneaky trickster or a full-on horror legend. You make the rules!

🔥 Mess Around, Have Fun, and Show Off Your Skills!

{556324550833441}
nodes.short_description:
👻 Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice
🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground
🎯 Complete Fun Missions

nodes.long_description:
👻 Play as a Ghost – **Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!**

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

👻 Become the Ultimate Ghost – Walk through walls, float, and move objects just by thinking about it!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice – Whisper, laugh, or scream into your mic and watch him panic!

🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground – No rules, no limits! Roam freely through a giant haunted house, uncovering hidden rooms, mysterious objects, and eerie surprises. Experiment with your powers and create your own ghostly mischief!

🎯 Complete Fun Missions & Solve Puzzles – Trick NPCs, uncover paranormal secrets, and test your ghostly skills through spooky challenges!

⚡ Super Interactive Gameplay – Open doors, knock over furniture, flicker lights—cause total chaos and see how NPCs react!

😂 Prank or Scare? It’s Up to You! – Be a sneaky trickster or a full-on horror legend. You make the rules!

🔥 Mess Around, Have Fun, and Show Off Your Skills! – Play your way, discover cool tricks, and see what crazy things you can do as a ghost!

💀 Are you ready to be the scariest (or funniest) ghost ever? 

Jump in and start haunting NOW!
nodes.short_description:
👻 Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice
🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground
🎯 Complete Fun Missions

nodes.change_log:
🎄 Update #17: THE CHRISTMAS HAUNTING HAS BEGUN!

Version 0.9.7.30

Welcome to the Christmas update of You Are Ghost — where holiday magic meets spooky mischief, and even Santa isn’t as kind as he seems…

🎅 Santa Grandpa Has Arrived… and He’s Not Jolly

Grandpa has fully embraced the holidays — now dressed as a dark, mischievous Evil Santa.

Don’t expect kindness… expect traps, surprises, and a very strange version of “ho-ho-ho”.

❄️ Christmas Takes Over the HUB & the Entire House

Both the HUB and the haunted house are now fully transformed into magical winter locations:

✨ shimmering garlands everywhere
✨ festive lights dancing across walls and ceilings
✨ cozy Christmas decorations in every room
✨ warm holiday glow mixed with eerie haunted vibes

🎁 Three New Holiday Bundles Arrive!

Meet our brand-new festive bundles:

🎅 Merry Crisis Bundle – Soft velvet gloves, candy-red details, and that warm “ho-ho-ho but also chaos” energy.
💚 Stolen Christmas Bundle – Fuzzy, green, and delightfully naughty — perfect for stealing Grandpa’s holiday spirit.
🔮 Platform 6 Bundle – Snowy sparkles, enchanted shimmer, and a dash of winter magic swirling around your hands.

Dress up, glow up, and haunt in true holiday style!

🎮 Play now: vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf
👻 Join our cozy haunted Discord: discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

Stay spooky — stay merry — and enjoy the most haunted Christmas ever! 🎄👻✨

🎥 Update #17: MEDIA BUNDLES ARE HERE! 👻✨

Version 0.9.7.29

⭐ New: Unique Media Bundles

Exclusive. Mysterious. And crafted especially for the creators haunting our spooky corner.

We’ve added a brand-new category of skins made just for content makers.

Find them. Unlock them. Show them off.

Or record and publish a video about the game — and claim a unique one of your own!

Yes, you heard that right — you can now get your own personal skin bundle in the game.
Jump in, check the new rules, and discover how to earn your exclusive look.

💡 Got ideas for future updates?
📩 Tell us at info@dream-dev.com

🎮 Play now: vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf
💬 Join the haunted Discord: discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

Stay spooky — and stay creative! 👻✨
---

🎃 Update #16: GRANDMA SPEAKS & NEW ANIMALS JOIN THE HAUNT! 🐒🐱🦍

Version 0.9.7.28

Just in time for Halloween — another spooky surprise is here! 👻

🧓 Grandma Finally Talks!

No more silent stares from the HUB! Grandma’s got a voice now — and she’s not afraid to use it.

🐾 3 New Animal Skins

The ghostly wardrobe grows again!

🦍 Gorilla – Big, bold, and ready to thump.

🐱 Cat – Stealthy and stylish, perfect for sneaky haunts.

🐒 Monkey – Wild energy and chaos guaranteed.

🎃 Halloween Spirit Continues

The house still glows with spooky vibes — so keep haunting, scaring, and looting while the candles are burning!

💡Got creepy or funny ideas for the next update?
📩 Drop them in the comments or email us at info@dream-dev.com

👻 Play now: vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

💬 Join our haunted Discord: discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

Stay spooky — and stay sneaky! 👻🎃
---

🎃 Update #15: HAUNTED HALLOWEEN HEIST 👻🕸️

Version 0.9.7.27

It’s time to haunt in style!

🕯️ Full Halloween Makeover

We’ve redecorated the house from top to bottom — glowing pumpkins, spooky lights, cobweb corners, and mysterious whispers echoing down the hall. 

🛒 New Skins for Cart & Hands

Your haunting gear just got a festive twist! Dress up your ghostly hands and trick-or-treat cart with creepy-cute Halloween skins. Whether you’re rocking pumpkin gloves or a cursed candy wagon — it’s your night to shine.

🧛‍♂️ Vampire Grandpa

He’s pale, he’s posh, and he definitely doesn’t sparkle in sunlight. Grandpa’s ready for Halloween too — with fangs, flair, and a thirst for chaos. Try not to scare him too hard... vampires bite back.

💰 New Lootable Items

More treasures, more tricks! We’ve added fresh Halloween-themed objects around the house — perfect for stealing and stacking up those extra coins. 🎃🪙

So get your coffin cart ready, your ghost gloves polished, and your best spooky laugh prepared.

💡Got eerie ideas for future chaos?
📩 Send them to: info@dream-dev.com

🎮 Play now: vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

👻 Join our haunted Discord: discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

Stay spooky — and stay sneaky! 👻🦇

---
👻 Big news — You Are Ghost has left Early Access!

🔮 Update #14: HUB & HEIST MAYHEM 💀🎒

Version 0.9.7.25

Dear ghostly crew,

The wait is over — our biggest update yet has arrived, and it changes everything about how you haunt Grandpa’s house.

Here’s what’s new in this monster patch:

🏠 The HUB
Your new home base! Upgrade your powers, track your progress, and unlock ghostly perks. Finally — a place to grow, plan, and flex your style.

🔫 Weapons Overhaul
Every weapon in the game has been reworked, rebalanced, and redesigned for maximum chaos. From the classics to the brand-new toys, everything feels sharper, louder, and deadlier.

💣 Explosive Additions
Grenades. Mines. Enough said. Drop them, throw them, or “accidentally” roll one under Grandpa’s chair.

🕵️ NEW GAME MODE: The Heist

It’s not just about haunting anymore — it’s about stealing. Sneak around the house, snatch Grandpa’s belongings, and stash them in your cart without being caught. The thrill of the heist meets the chaos of haunting.

🎭 Customization

Dress to distress! New skins for your ghostly hands and even your loot cart. Haunting has never looked this stylish.

This update marks a turning point for You Are Ghost — deeper progression, bigger tools, and a brand-new way to play.

👻 So gear up, prank smart, and remember: Grandpa’s treasures won’t steal themselves.

📩 Got wild ideas for future chaos? Send them to: info@dream-dev.com

👻 Haunt us on Discord: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV
🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay spooky — and stay sneaky! 👻💼

---

👻 Update #13: Setting the Stage for Something Big 🎮

Version 0.9.7.21

Dear friends!

Right now, we’re working on a huge new game update with an entirely new game mode.

It will take some time to craft, but we promise — it’ll be worth the wait!

Meanwhile, in this update:

📜 Added Terms of Use

⭐ Revamped the game review window

📊 Added game analytics

Stay tuned, ghostly crew — big things are coming!

---

🪂 Update #12: DRAG & DROP GRANDPA 👴📦

Version 0.9.7.18

This week… gravity takes a vacation.

You asked for more chaos. You got it.
Introducing: full grandpa manipulation.

🧲 Drag & Drop Grandpa

That’s right — grandpa is now fully draggable.
Want to gently place him in the freezer? Go for it.
Yeet him into the washing machine? Absolutely.
Flush him down the toilet? We’re not here to judge.

We added the tools. You bring the madness.

🚨 Heads up, ghostly crew!

The next update will be huge — possibly our biggest yet.
But we’ll need a little more time to make it awesome.
So there’ll be a short break before the next release.

💡 Got ideas for what else we should let you throw grandpa into?
A blender? A rocket ship? A wormhole?

We’re always listening 👻

📩 Send us your cursed suggestions: info@dream-dev.com
👻 Haunt us on Discord: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV
🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay grabby. Stay spooky. 👻

---

🕵️‍♂️ Update #11: CASE: GRANDPA 🔍👴🎯

Version 0.9.7.17

This week... it’s personal.

Your ghostly investigation just got an upgrade — welcome to your very own Spy Room!

🎙️ The Spy Room

Turns out... you’ve been haunting grandpa since forever.

This brand-new secret room is packed with:

📼 Creepy Audio Logs – Recordings of grandpa’s life from childhood to now. Yes... we’ve been watching.

🔭 Surveillance Setup – Screens, notes, files — your ghost has been very thorough.

🎯 The Target Range

Practice your haunting aim — finally, a safe space to throw things directly at grandpa.

Can you land a perfect shot before he even notices?

🐔 The Eternal Question
What came first... the chicken, the egg, or grandpa?

This mysterious room may hold the answer — or at least give you more questions.

🎯 Ready to start your investigation?

Got a theory about grandpa? Want us to add even more weirdness?

🔎 Quick tip for ghostly explorers:

If you want to find the hidden room fast — think like a ghost... and search where grandpa would never look.

📩 Write to us: info@dream-dev.com
👻 Join the haunted crew: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV
🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay spooky — and stay suspicious! 👻🕵️‍♂️

---

🗝️ Update #10: FIND THE SECRETS 👻🔍

Version 0.9.7.16

In this update, we’re cranking up the mystery and unlocking doors you didn’t even know existed...

✨ Ready to venture beyond the walls?

We’re dropping our biggest secret yet — 3 hidden rooms have just appeared!

🔬 The Alien Experiment Room

Welcome to a galaxy-level lab full of strange tech and stranger intentions.
Everything here is classified — including the Noisy Cricket.
(Whatever that means… even we’re not sure.)

🧪 The Hidden Lab

What happens when you mix one weird thing with another?
That’s right — something explosively unexpected.
Track down the lab, start experimenting, and brace yourself for surprises.

🌌 The Room Beyond the Horizon

No doors. No windows.
Only whispers, stars, and the eerie sense that you’re not in the house anymore.
Lost? Good. That’s exactly how it’s supposed to feel.
(Or... maybe not.)

Also in this update:

✅ Performance Boost
Our lead dev promised smoother FPS. If you feel it — tell us! If you don’t... tell us anyway.

🐞 Bug Fixes
We squashed around 15 creepy bugs. Verified. Terminated. Gone.

✨ Other Improvements
Tiny tweaks, forgotten fixes, mysterious enhancements. They’re in there somewhere.

🎯 Have you uncovered all the secrets?

Still searching? Starting to wonder if they’re even real?
Got a wild idea for what we should add next?

📩 Drop us a line: info@dream-dev.com
👻 Join the haunted crew: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV
🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay sneaky. Stay spooky. 👻✨

---
🪩 Update #9 : DISCO PARTY 🎛️

Version 0.9.7.15

This week, we’re turning up the volume, flashing the lights, and summoning the spirit of the undead dance floor! 💥

Get ready for the wildest room in the haunted house — the brand-new Disco Room is here!

🕺 Create Your Own Music – Take control of the DJ booth! Mix beats, drop samples, and craft your very own haunted house tracks.

🎚️ Multiple Sound Sets – Whether you’re into spooky synths, silly sound effects, or retro beats — we’ve got a set for your sound.

✨ Light Show Madness – Watch the room come alive with colorful lights, laser beams, and a disco ball that spins like nobody’s watching.

🌫️ Fog Machine – Because no dance floor is complete without a cloud of mysterious mist.

🎆 Dancefloor Effects – Extra flashes, sparkles, and confetti chaos await your every beat drop.

This update is pure ghostly party mode!

Also in this update:

🐞 Bug Fixes

- Fixed an issue where lamp and puzzle quests couldn’t be completed

- Fixed grabbing issues when Brainrots are scaled up

Got feedback or an idea for the next haunted hit?

Let us know at info@dream-dev.com or hop into the ghostly groove on Discord: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay spooky — and stay funky! 👻🕺

-----
Version 0.9.7.14

Changed the review request window

----

🛠️ Week #8 Update: Boo-fixes & Tweaks 👻✨

Version 0.9.7.13

This week, it’s all about polishing the paranormal. No new chaos — just a smoother, smarter, spookier haunting experience.

Here’s what’s under the ghostly hood:

⚡ FPS & Stability Boost – Huge performance improvements to keep your haunting silky-smooth, even in the messiest moments.

🪑 Visual Touch-Ups – Some furniture got a spooky fresh coat of paint. 

🧓 Smarter Grandpa – When angry, Grandpa now locks eyes with you more accurately. He also pays more attention to whatever’s scaring the life out of him. Good luck with that.

🎙️ Better Voice Detection – Grandpa’s reactions to your ghostly whispers and screams are now sharper, funnier, and more on point.

🧵 Texture Gaps Patched – We stitched up those pesky seams in the walls and floors. Ghost-approved renovation.

🪛 And of course...

- More bug fixes

- Minor tweaks across the house to improve your overall haunting flow.

No new toys this time — but these upgrades set the stage for even wilder chaos coming next week.

Got ghostly suggestions or found a bug we missed?

Let us know at info@dream-dev.com or haunt us on Discord: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

🎮 Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

Stay smooth, stay spooky! 👻

----

🎨 Week #7 Update: HOUSE RENOVATION 🛠️💡

Version 0.9.7.12

You asked — we delivered.

It’s time for a serious glow-up.

This week’s update brings a full visual refresh to your favorite haunted house:

💡 Brighter, Bolder, Hauntier – We’ve reworked the lighting and color palette across the entire house to make everything clearer, creepier, and more vibrant. Shadows dance, lights flicker, and your ghostly tricks look better than ever.

📚 Grandpa’s Secret Office – Renovated – The mysterious study just got a makeover. New layout, new clues, new surprises… and maybe even more secrets to discover. Was Grandpa always this suspicious?

This renovation isn’t just cosmetic — it sets the mood for new chaos to come. 👻

Have spooky ideas for what we should upgrade next?

Drop us a ghostly whisper at info@dream-dev.com or join the haunting over on Discord: https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW

🎮 Link to the game: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf


🧠 Week #6 Update: ITALIAN BRAINROT INVASION

Version 0.9.7.11

They’re loud. They’re unhinged. They’re finally here.

Meet the 4 viral legends crashing into the haunted house — complete with original voice lines and animations!

🦈 TRALALERO TRALALA – The shark with moves and a battle cry nobody can explain.

🐊 BOMBARDIRO CROCODILO – He stomps. He roars. He’s ready to flatten furniture (and your senses).

🪵 TUNG TUNG TUNG SAGUR – Nobody knows what he wants, but he wants it loud.

🎀  BALLERINA CAPPUCCINO  – Twirls, screeches, and spills espresso chaos.

Expect chaos, confusion, and uncontrollable laughter as these four join your spooky sandbox.

Got a Brainrot idea we missed?

Send your madness to info@dream-dev.com or scream it in our Discord: https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW

New haunting horrors drop next week — stay spooky!

🎮  Play now: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

---

🍰 Week #5 Update: Yuck & Yum 🍕🧄🥫💩

Version 0.9.7.10

Hungry for chaos? So is Grandpa — and this week, the ghost becomes the chef! 🍽️👻

In this mouthwatering (and sometimes horrifying) update, we’re introducing a brand-new feeding mechanic:

🍲 Feed Grandpa – Pick any item, edible or... questionably edible, and shove it into grandpa’s mouth. Yes, even the soap.

🤢 13 Unique Grandpa Reactions – From delighted chewing to full-on gagging, grandpa now reacts to what you feed him with wild animations, sounds, and facial expressions.

🧀 New Ingredients & Objects – Mix and match everything from tasty snacks to cursed condiments. Some bites are yum... others are yuck.

Will you become the ghostly gourmet — or the worst chef in the afterlife?

Also in this update:

- Added more food and non-food items to experiment with

- Optimizations and bug fixes for smoother haunting

Got an idea for grandpa’s next favorite (or least favorite) snack?

👨‍🍳 Help cook up the madness — email us at info@dream-dev.com or join our haunted kitchen on Discord: https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW

New ghostly flavor drops next week — stay spooky and stay fed! 👻

🎮 Link to the game: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

---

Version 0.9.7.9

👻 Week #4 Update: Spooky Pals 🕷🐍

This week, the ghost isn’t haunting alone anymore — meet your two new delightfully disturbing sidekicks!

🕷 Spider Buddy – He’s old, grumpy, and hates everything. He growls at anything that moves (and even what doesn’t). Worst of all? He shoots webs from a place we don’t talk about. If he doesn’t like you — you’ll know. If he does… you’ll still know.

🐍 Slinky Snake – She’s fast, flashy, and dangerously fabulous. She slithers, wraps around things (and people), and her kisses? Let’s just say one smooch and you might end up in the afterlife — smiling.

Let chaos crawl and coil through grandpa’s life — and yours!

Also in this update:

- We’ve reduced the weight of certain objects — like the bat, mop, and frying pan — to make interactions smoother
- Increased the duration for saving images from marker drawings
- General game improvements and optimizations

Got spooky ideas or weird creatures you'd love to see?

Help us haunt smarter — send your thoughts to info@dream-dev.com or join the fun on Discord: https://discord.gg/NCUB77ZW

New mayhem drops next week — stay haunted! 👻

🎮 Link to the game: https://vr.meta.me/s/1XQTSmiyUt8Y1Mf

---

Version 0.9.7.7

Week #3 Update: Punch Time 🥊

In this update, the ghost slips on a pair of boxing gloves and steps into the ring with grandpa himself!

Introducing the brand-new mini-game: Boxing with Grandpa 🧓💥

Duck, dodge, and deliver the spookiest punches in a hilarious 1v1 brawl.

Can you go the full 12 rounds... or will grandpa land the knockout punch? 🥴

Step into the haunted ring and decide who’s the real champ of the house!

🥊 Boxing Gloves Added – Equip your ghost with cartoon-style gloves and challenge grandpa to a duel.
🎮 Improved Hit Detection – Every punch counts!

Also in this update:

- Expanded entry to the ghost’s room
- Sound improvements
- General improvements to grandpa’s movement animations
- Smooth transition added when restarting the game after the ghost dies
- Bug fixes & polish

Got a wild idea for what the ghost should do next?
We’re building the game with you — email us at info@dream-dev.com

New mischief drops next week — stay punchy and spooky! 👻

🎮 Link to the game:

https://vr.meta.me/s/2eRQMxytRLAtg8k

---
Version 0.9.7.4

Week #2 Update: Toy Arsenal 💥

Ready to turn the house into a chaotic playground? The ghost just found a box of ridiculous toy weapons — and grandpa’s in big trouble!

This update brings four brand new tools of mischievous destruction:

🔍 Grow & Shrink Ray – Make anything huge... or teeny-tiny. Yes, even grandpa.
🪠 Mega Plunger Launcher – Sticks to stuff. Mostly grandpa.
🌊 Water Bazooka – Soak everything (and everyone) in your path!

👻 Big news — You Are Ghost has left Early Access!

🔮 Update #14: HUB & HEIST MAYHEM 💀🎒

Version 0.9.7.25

Dear ghostly crew,

The wait is over — our biggest update yet has arrived, and it changes everything about how you haunt Grandpa’s house.

Here’s what’s new in this monster patch:

🏠 The HUB
Your new home base! Upgrade your powers, track your progress, and unlock ghostly perks. Finally — a place to grow, plan, and flex your style.

🔫 Weapons Overhaul
Every weapon in the game has been reworked, rebalanced, and redesigned for maximum chaos. From the classics to the brand-new toys, everything feels sharper, louder, and deadlier.

💣 Explosive Additions
Grenades. Mines. Enough said. Drop them, throw them, or “accidentally” roll one under Grandpa’s chair.

🕵️ NEW GAME MODE: The Heist

It’s not just about haunting anymore — it’s about stealing. Sneak around the house, snatch Grandpa’s belongings, and stash them in your cart without being caught. The thrill of the heist meets the chaos of haunting.

🎭 Customization

Dress to distress! New skins for your ghostly hands and even your loot cart. Haunting has never looked this stylish.

This update marks a turning point for You Are Ghost — deeper progression, bigger tools, and a brand-new way to play.

👻 So gear up, prank smart, and remember: Grandpa’s treasures won’t steal themselves.

📩 Got wild ideas for future chaos? Send them to: info@dream-dev.com

👻 Haunt us on Discord: https://discord.gg/KWbBb9dgPV

🪂 Update #12: DRAG & DROP GRANDPA 👴📦

Version 0.9.7.18

This week… gravity takes a vacation.

You asked for more chaos. You got it.
Introducing: full grandpa manipulation.

🧲 Drag & Drop Grandpa

That’s right — grandpa is now fully draggable.
Want to gently place him in the freezer? Go for it.
Yeet him into the washing machine? Absolutely.
Flush him down the toilet? We’re not here to judge.

We added the tools. You bring the madness.

🗝️ Update #10: FIND THE SECRETS 👻🔍

Version 0.9.7.16

In this update, we’re cranking up the mystery and unlocking doors you didn’t even know existed...

✨ Ready to venture beyond the walls?

We’re dropping our biggest secret yet — 3 hidden rooms have just appeared!

🔬 The Alien Experiment Room

Welcome to a galaxy-level lab full of strange tech and stranger intentions.
Everything here is classified — including the Noisy Cricket.
(Whatever that means… even we’re not sure.)

🧪 The Hidden Lab

What happens when you mix one weird thing with another?
That’s right — something explosively unexpected.
Track down the lab, start experimenting, and brace yourself for surprises.

🌌 The Room Beyond the Horizon

No doors. No windows.
Only whispers, stars, and the eerie sense that you’re not in the house anymore.
Lost? Good. That’s exactly how it’s supposed to feel.
(Or... maybe not.)

Also in this update:

✅ Performance Boost
Our lead dev promised smoother FPS. If you feel it — tell us! If you don’t... tell us anyway.

🐞 Bug Fixes
We squashed around 15 creepy bugs. Verified. Terminated. Gone.

✨ Other Improvements
Tiny tweaks, forgotten fixes, mysterious enhancements. They’re in there somewhere.

🎯 Have you uncovered all the secrets?

Still searching? Starting to wonder if they’re even real?

🍰 Week #5 Update: Yuck & Yum 🍕🧄🥫💩

Version 0.9.7.10

Hungry for chaos? So is Grandpa — and this week, the ghost becomes the chef! 🍽️👻

In this mouthwatering (and sometimes horrifying) update, we’re introducing a brand-new feeding mechanic:

🍲 Feed Grandpa – Pick any item, edible or... questionably edible, and shove it into grandpa’s mouth. Yes, even the soap.

🤢 13 Unique Grandpa Reactions – From delighted chewing to full-on gagging, grandpa now reacts to what you feed him with wild animations, sounds, and facial expressions.

🧀 New Ingredients & Objects – Mix and match everything from tasty snacks to cursed condiments. Some bites are yum... others are yuck.

👻 Week #4 Update: Spooky Pals 🕷🐍

This week, the ghost isn’t haunting alone anymore — meet your two new delightfully disturbing sidekicks!

🐍 Slinky Snake – She’s fast, flashy, and dangerously fabulous. She slithers, wraps around things (and people), and her kisses? Let’s just say one smooch and you might end up in the afterlife — smiling.

Let chaos crawl and coil through grandpa’s life — and yours!

🗝️ Update #10: FIND THE SECRETS 👻🔍

Version 0.9.7.16

In this update, we’re cranking up the mystery and unlocking doors you didn’t even know existed...

✨ Ready to venture beyond the walls?

We’re dropping our biggest secret yet — 3 hidden rooms have just appeared!

🔬 The Alien Experiment Room

Welcome to a galaxy-level lab full of strange tech and stranger intentions.
Everything here is classified — including the Noisy Cricket.
(Whatever that means… even we’re not sure.)

🧪 The Hidden Lab

What happens when you mix one weird thing with another?
That’s right — something explosively unexpected.
Track down the lab, start experimenting, and brace yourself for surprises.

🌌 The Room Beyond the Horizon

No doors. No windows.
Only whispers, stars, and the eerie sense that you’re not in the house anymore.
Lost? Good. That’s exactly how it’s supposed to feel.
(Or... maybe not.)

Version 0.9.7.13

This week, it’s all about polishing the paranormal. No new chaos — just a smoother, smarter, spookier haunting experience.

⚡ FPS & Stability Boost – Huge performance improvements to keep your haunting silky-smooth, even in the messiest moments.

🪑 Visual Touch-Ups – Some furniture got a spooky fresh coat of paint.

🎙️ Better Voice Detection – Grandpa’s reactions to your ghostly whispers and screams are now sharper, funnier, and more on point.

🧵 Texture Gaps Patched – We stitched up those pesky seams in the walls and floors. Ghost-approved renovation.

🪛 And of course...

- More bug fixes

- Minor tweaks across the house to improve your overall haunting flow.

No new toys this time — but these upgrades set the stage for even wilder chaos coming next week.

🍰 Week #5 Update: Yuck & Yum 🍕🧄🥫💩

Version 0.9.7.10

Hungry for chaos? So is Grandpa — and this week, the ghost becomes the chef! 🍽️👻

In this mouthwatering (and sometimes horrifying) update, we’re introducing a brand-new feeding mechanic:

🍲 Feed Grandpa – Pick any item, edible or... questionably edible, and shove it into grandpa’s mouth. Yes, even the soap.

🤢 13 Unique Grandpa Reactions – From delighted chewing to full-on gagging, grandpa now reacts to what you feed him with wild animations, sounds, and facial expressions.

🧀 New Ingredients & Objects – Mix and match everything from tasty snacks to cursed condiments. Some bites are yum... others are yuck.

Will you become the ghostly gourmet — or the worst chef in the afterlife?

- Added more food and non-food items to experiment with

- Optimizations and bug fixes for smoother haunting

Version 0.9.7.9

👻 Week #4 Update: Spooky Pals 🕷🐍

This week, the ghost isn’t haunting alone anymore — meet your two new delightfully disturbing sidekicks!

🕷 Spider Buddy – He’s old, grumpy, and hates everything. He growls at anything that moves (and even what doesn’t). Worst of all? He shoots webs from a place we don’t talk about. If he doesn’t like you — you’ll know. If he does… you’ll still know.

🐍 Slinky Snake – She’s fast, flashy, and dangerously fabulous. She slithers, wraps around things (and people), and her kisses? Let’s just say one smooch and you might end up in the afterlife — smiling.

Let chaos crawl and coil through grandpa’s life — and yours!

First Version:

Play as a Ghost – Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where your own voice is your ultimate tool for terror! Whisper, laugh, or scream into your microphone to frighten an old grandpa and mess with the living in hilarious ways. Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and uncover the haunted house’s hidden secrets.

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!
